entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump 100 people just from INDIANA have died from COVID-19 over the past two days - stop pretending that this is some minor nuisance that just exists to hurt your BS re-election narrative...this is a genuine pandemic and Americans are dying on your watch!
